title: 'Very elegant'
body: 'I am happy with this elegant sofa. It has completely shifted the space dynamic in the room. Overall I am happy with the product. Am giving it 4 star because the delivery was delayed by more than a week.'

title: 'Classy and Sleek 3 seater'
body: 'It’s classy It’s sleek It’s very comfortable too'

title: 'Beautiful design and durable'
body: 'Loved the design and the work is also very neat. Material used is also very good and looks durable. The packaging was very good and very strong. The sofa was very well covered. The seller made sure the product was delivered without any issues. I cud contact them without any issues for any updates. Thank you ND EURO HANDICRAFT!! And all the best. Will look forward to shop a few more products from them.'
